trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Newbury
There were no other sightings in Newbury on or around March 14th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi had stepped outside for a cigarette and was practicing with my new camcorder when i noticed an incredibly bright white\pink light moving across the sky heading in a north east direction. at first it was above my head and i watched for a while as it moved at a steady pace. my mum then joined me outside and also whitnessed the light. it was silent and it was continuously glowing. after a few moments of observing i began to film with my new 70x optical zoom camcorder. you can view the footage here; http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=myafpw6rsdo
Summary: Bright star like object hovered steadily across the sky
